indicator_name: Proportion of countries where the legal framework (including customary law) guarantees women’s equal rights to land ownership and/or control
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals compilation of previous metadata
other_info: Data follows the UN specification for this indicator. This indicator has been identified in collaboration with topic experts.
page_content:
**Non-statistical indicator**

We have identified the following policies relevant to this indicator - [Equality Act 2010](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/equality-act-2010-guidance).
data_notice_text: This indicator was revised following indicator changes from the United Nations 2020 Comprehensive Review.
